title: MacBook Air 2020 review: the best Mac for most people
description: Apples 2020 MacBook Air comes with the new scissor-switch keyboard the company introduced in the 16-inch MacBook Pro, and the processors have been upgraded to Intels new 10th-generation parts. Apples also lowered the price by $100, with the new MacBook Air now starting at $999. Nilay Patel has the full review.   Read more:   Vox Media has affiliate partnerships.
